entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
